caption.title: Tumorigenicity assay of TOP-GFP culture.
caption.p: Cell numbers from the indicated populations were injected into female athymic nude mice. Cells were left untreated or treated with 1:2 dilution of MFCM for 2 hr before injection. The number of successful tumor initiations after nine weeks out of four injected mice for each condition is reported. Planned contrast between TOP-GFPlow vs TOP-GFPhigh (χ2 = 0.084, uncorrected p=0.772, corrected p>0.99). Planned contrast between TOP-GFPlow vs TOP-GFPlow + MFCM (χ2 = 3.32, uncorrected p=0.069, corrected p=0.137). Additional details for this experiment can be found at https://osf.io/j73xu/.
